name: CreativeInventory
description: The `CreativeInventory` class provides specialized access to Minecraft's creative mode inventory interface, allowing scripts to interact with creative inventory tabs, search functionality, hotbar management, and item spawning capabilities. This class extends the base `Inventory` class and adds creative mode-specific functionality for browsing item categories, searching items, managing saved hotbars, and directly manipulating inventory contents in creative mode.
overview:
Creative mode inventory in Minecraft has the following main components:
- **Creative Item Tabs:** Categorized item groups (Building Blocks, Decorations, Redstone, etc.)
- **Search Tab:** Text-based item search functionality
- **Inventory Tab:** Player's survival-style inventory
- **Hotbar Tab:** Saved creative hotbar configurations
- **Item List:** Scrollable list of all items in selected category
- **Cursor Stack:** Creative mode's ability to hold item stacks on the mouse cursor

## Accessing CreativeInventory

You typically get `CreativeInventory` instances when the player has the creative inventory screen open:

```javascript
// Check if current screen is creative inventory
const inv = Inventory.create();
if (inv && inv.getType() === "Creative") {
    const creative = inv; // Already typed as CreativeInventory
    Chat.log("Creative inventory detected!");
}
```

methods.name: scroll
methods.description: Scrolls the creative item list by a given amount.

methods.name: scrollTo
methods.description: Scrolls the creative item list to a specific position.

methods.name: selectTab
methods.description: Selects a creative inventory tab by its name. Tab names are case-sensitive.

parameters.name: tabName
parameters.description: The name of the tab to select (e.g., 'Building Blocks', 'Redstone').

methods.name: selectSearch
methods.description: Selects the search tab in the creative inventory, allowing text-based item search.

methods.name: selectInventory
methods.description: Selects the player's survival-style inventory tab within the creative inventory.

methods.name: selectHotbar
methods.description: Selects the saved hotbars tab in the creative inventory, for managing hotbar configurations.

methods.name: getTabNames
methods.description: Gets a list of all available creative inventory tab names.

methods.name: getTabTexts
methods.description: Gets a list of all available creative inventory tab display texts.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs a text-based search for items in the creative inventory. Requires the search tab to be selected.

methods.name: getShownItems
methods.description: Gets a list of items currently displayed in the creative item list (after a tab selection or search).

methods.name: setStack
methods.description: Sets an item stack in a specified inventory slot. Only works in creative mode. This can be used to spawn items.

parameters.name: slot
parameters.description: The slot index where the item should be placed.

methods.name: setCursorStack
methods.description: Places an item stack onto the mouse cursor in creative mode.

parameters.name: stack
parameters.description: The item stack to place on the cursor.

methods.name: destroyHeldItem
methods.description: Destroys the item currently held on the mouse cursor in creative mode.

methods.name: destroyAllItems
methods.description: Destroys all items in the player's creative inventory. This action is permanent.

methods.name: saveHotbar
methods.description: Saves the current hotbar configuration to a creative hotbar save slot (0-8).

methods.name: restoreHotbar
methods.description: Restores a saved creative hotbar configuration from a slot (0-8) to the player's active hotbar.

methods.name: getSavedHotbar
methods.description: Retrieves the items stored in a specific creative hotbar save slot (0-8).

methods.name: isInHotbar
methods.description: Checks if the specified slot index corresponds to a creative hotbar save slot.

methods.name: getOffhand
methods.description: Gets the item in the offhand slot.

methods.name: getHelmet
methods.description: Gets the item in the helmet armor slot.

methods.name: getChestplate
methods.description: Gets the item in the chestplate armor slot.

methods.name: getLeggings
methods.description: Gets the item in the leggings armor slot.

methods.name: getBoots
methods.description: Gets the item in the boots armor slot.

methods.name: getSlot
methods.description: Get item at specific slot index.

methods.name: getTotalSlots
methods.description: Get total number of slots.

methods.name: getSlotUnderMouse
methods.description: Get slot index under mouse cursor.

methods.name: getHeld
methods.description: Get item currently held by mouse.

methods.name: click
methods.description: Click a slot (left click by default).

methods.name: click
methods.description: Click a slot with a specific mouse button.

methods.name: quick
methods.description: Shift-click to move items (quick move).

parameters.name: slot
parameters.description: The slot index to quick move.

methods.name: dropSlot
methods.description: Drop items from a specific slot.

parameters.name: slot
parameters.description: The slot index to drop items from.

methods.name: swapHotbar
methods.description: Swap item in a slot with an item in a hotbar slot.

methods.name: swap
methods.description: Swap two slots.

methods.name: contains
methods.description: Check if inventory contains a specific item.

parameters.name: item
parameters.description: The item stack to search for.

methods.name: findItem
methods.description: Find all slots with a specific item.

methods.name: getItems
methods.description: Get all non-empty items in the inventory.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Get item counts by type.

methods.name: getItems
methods.description: Get items from specific mapped areas.

parameters.name: mapIdentifiers
parameters.description: Whether to map items by identifiers.

methods.name: close
methods.description: Close the inventory screen.

methods.name: getType
methods.description: Get inventory type name.

methods.name: getMap
methods.description: Get slot mapping information.

methods.name: getLocation
methods.description: Get location description for a slot.

methods.name: getSlotPos
methods.description: Get screen position of a slot.
